TopicTitle: Help Removing Loading Screen for RSS KSP

Articles.Content: Hey everyone. I'm thinking of doing Realism Overhaul and RSS and I know it comes with a crap ton of mods and I want to try them all out. I am really needing help on how to remove the painful loading screen. Thanks
What do you mean by remove it? Like help speed it up? You really can't without getting a faster system or drive.

If you're concerned about the various KSC screen shots and artwork, don't be.  With a full RSS/RO/RP-1 install, at least, you instead get a selection of screen shots from RSS -- launches and orbital shots in high resolution and with visual enhancements installed.  Vostok launching over an ocean sunrise, a Korolev cross over Florida, some sort of probe against the sunlit Moon, etc.

Edit: if you mean the incredibly long process of Module Manager applying 50,000+ patches, that's much shorter on subsequent loads; as long as you don't change any of your mods, those patches will load from cache on subsequent game starts, saving roundly ten minutes of startup time.

Edited July 2, 2018 by Zeiss Ikon
